alert.note: Alert for Great Salt Lake Desert and Mountains (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 23 at 3:42PM MDT by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of western Box Elder County through 445 PM MDT... At 341 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 30 miles south of Oakley Reservoir to 14 miles southeast of Montello. Movement was northeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph. SOURCE...Mesonet station. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Lynn, Lucin, Etna and Grouse Creek. This includes Utah Route 30 between mile markers 1 and 26. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Great Salt Lake Desert and Mountains
